en.biography: I design and develop solutions by uniting creativity, data, and technology. My focus is transforming challenges into high-impact strategies that maximize results.
en.aboutMe: I am a multidisciplinary professional with a passion for connecting creativity, data, and technology. My approach integrates advertising strategy with data analysis, software development, and visual storytelling through photography to build comprehensive, high-impact solutions.
en.signature: Creating the future, one line of code at a time.
en.homeDescription: Professional portfolio of Erik Ramirez, data analyst, software developer, and advertising specialist with a passion for creative photography. I combine data, code, creativity, and photography to craft meaningful and visually impactful digital experiences.
en.homeKeywords: data analysis, data visualization, software development, web development, advertising, digital marketing, photography, creative portfolio, analytics, frontend, backend, full stack, data science, visualization, branding, photo editing

roles.title: Advertising Specialist
roles.description: Expert in brand strategy and advertising creativity. I develop high-impact campaigns that transform ideas into memorable experiences, fusing design, innovation, and strategy.
roles.alt: Anime animation: Commercial with an anime hand holding a soft drink.

roles.title: Data Analyst
roles.description: Specialist in extracting, processing, and analyzing large volumes of data. I turn complex findings into clear insights, visualizations, and reports to guide strategy and optimize results.
roles.alt: Analyst manipulating complex controls and reviewing printed data outputs.

roles.title: Software Developer
roles.description: I design and implement robust software solutions. I convert business requirements into efficient applications, managing the full cycle to optimize operations and maximize strategic impact.
roles.alt: Animation of hands rapidly typing on a futuristic interface or control panel, executing complex commands on a high-tech system.

roles.title: Photographer
roles.description: I tell stories with light. I specialize in capturing genuine moments and the essence of people/brands, crafting timeless images where technique meets vision.
roles.alt: Animation of a professional photographer manipulating a DSLR camera, capturing a dramatic landscape of the sky and mountains.

projects.description: This project will be available soon. Stay tuned to see it shortly.
